About
=====
Development Team
-----------------------

This project was started by `Rahul De' <https://github.com/rahul080327>`_, Apoorv Agarwal and Akash Giri in the spring of 2014.

Everyone who has contributed towards this project are:

1. Rahul De'
2. Apoorv Agarwal
3. Akash Giri
4. Pratik Shah
5. Mayuresh Waykole
